location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 22: Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, makes a request for a fresh supply of items which may be offered as presents to local rulers. The letter is followed by a list of presents remaining on hand in the office of the Resident on 28 March 1824.
